title: Last Day In Florida
description: Jim tries to warn Dwight that he's going to be fired after Robert rejects the Sabre Store idea, but he refuses to listen. Meanwhile, Darryl and Toby try to sell cookies to Kevin, and Erin tells Andy she's not coming back from Florida.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [exiting office] Everyone stop what you're doing, I have terrible news. Dwight is no longer with us.

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: [gasps] What?! Why is that?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: He's gone, damn it! He's been promoted to VP of Sabre Retail and he's staying in Florida forever.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: So, he's alive.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah. That was him on the phone. He sounds wonderful.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Well, the way you said it made it sound like he was dead.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: How could I have been more clear? He had a massive stroke [slight pause] of good fortune and he is now in a better place.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: If Dwight's not coming back, does that mean we can open his treasure?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: You guys, we've gone over this, there is no treasure. [Erin retrieves the "treasure box" and slams it down on Dwight's desk]

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: When the team left for Tallahassee, Dwight told everyone not to touch his treasure. [cut to Dwight holding treasure chest and telling the office "Don't touch my treasure. Ok, you understand?"] Obviously he wants us to obsess about it. There's nothing in there. [has realization] Which is obviously what he would want us to think, making it the perfect place to hide a treasure. Oh god, I'm Wallace Shawn in The Princess Bride.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I think that Dwight wanted us to realize that this conversation among friends is the true treasure. [everyone disagrees]

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: I am dying to know what's in there.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, I know, Oscar we all are but nobody's gonna open it. You'd have to be insane. [everyone turns to look at Creed]

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Hi, hello.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [to Creed standing in front of the "treasure box"] Now, carefully... open the box.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: [opens box, pulls out and displays contents] It's a photo of all of us.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Aw, that's so sweet! [dart fires out of box and lodges in ceiling]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [feigning surprise] A dart? Are you kidding me? Who would put a poison dart, well, I mean, I don't know that it's poison. I mean, I just have to imagine. God, I'm glad he's OK though. Kinda sounds like he deserved it, opening another man's treasure and all. Wow!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [on a golf course] Well, mister ball, it's been a pleasure. Now, give my regards to hell. Da! [hits ball]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Oh, all right! Well swung my VIP VP.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I am loving the chemistry between you two.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: I am so happy Dwight is gonna be working alongside me. We are a regular Archibald and his man George.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I bet. I'm excited.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Trick... there's no such thing. It's not even a real English duo.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ah!

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: I just made you look like the goat of Dover. And that doesn't exist either.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [to Robert] You think you're excited? You should feel my nipples. [Robert gives a fake laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh, that reminds me. [reaching into golf cart] Little something from all of us. [hand Dwight a small wrapped gift]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [sarcastically] Oh my gosh, thank you Jim, that's so thoughtful. [sets gift on golf tee] Four! [smashes gift] Oh yeah!

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: He doesn't even care.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Don't even care!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: This is the last time I'll ever see Dwight. It's a weird feeling, it's, um, what's the word? It's not, it's not bittersweet. It's uh... sweet. Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [entering Andy's office] Hey, man. Selling cookies for Jada. Want the same as last year?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Would if I could. And I can so I will. Put me down for one box. Don't care what it is, dealer's choice.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I'll put you down for shortbreads.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Damn it.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: [entering Andy's office] Knock, knock. Hey, Sasha's first year in the troops, so I'm selling cookies for her. Anyway, would you like some?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: No. No.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I been selling here for five years. This is my spot.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: You can't claim territories. This is the only place I interact with people. Can't you sell at your church or barber shop? [Darryl looks hurt] Or chess club, or?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: You know what? It's your first time, let's split the office. You can have sales, the annex, Creed, and I don't know I'll just take, uh, accounting.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: That's it? Yeah, well, ok. Thanks Darryl.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: OK, great.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [exits Andy's office smiling] All I need is Kevin. Dude buys more cookies than everyone combined and then some. [Kevin waves at him] When I first started selling cookies he was a relatively thin man. Not a thin man, mind you. Relatively thin.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [entering a home carrying groceries] Hellosi, I'm home, babaloo.

quotes.speaker: Elderly Woman
quotes.text: [rises from chair] Oh, here let me help.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [spilling groceries] I got it. It was so busy at the store today. Really good cheese samples. I had, like, a hundred.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Irene hired me as her live-in helper. We met at the store launch. I told her I was moving here and I needed a place and it just sort of made sense. I basically do everything for her. [Erin randomly adds an assortment of pills to a weekly pill box] I run errands. I do chores around the house. I cook and clean. Honestly, I don't know how she survived without me.

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: When can I introduce you to my grandson? He's a wonderful swimmer. Shallow end, deep end. He does it all.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Well, today might be kind of tough, Irene. I have to talk to my old boss, Andy, and tell him I'm staying in Florida. [hands Irene a mug]

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: [takes mug] Thank you. [takes a sip] Oh, what kind of tea is this?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, I boiled some Gatorade.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: [misses putt] Ah. In England, they put the holes a little bit to the right, you see. We'll just chalk it up to cultural bias.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: If I may, [assists Nellie] try holding the putter... yeah, with your wrists here. And your thumbs here.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: That's right. Your little finger.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [approaches Kevin] Would you like to buy some cookies?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Cookies, eh?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [singing] Oh, the springtime thinks that it's the best. And fall time thinks that it's the best. Cold time has, kind of a strut. And Valentine's thinks that it's the best. But gather round, peeps, I'll tell you the truth. Nothing beats the cookie season, that's the truth.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [Kevin scratches cookie order form and sniffs it] It's not a scratch-and-sniff, Kev.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I know. But sometimes you still get a little something.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: [to Darryl] Hey, you tricked me. You just wanted Kevin.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: You're new to the game. You learned a lesson today. See you next year, sport.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: No, no, no. It's not fair. What if Kevin wants to buy cookies from me?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I do.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: See?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: That doesn't mean anything. [to Kevin] Kevin, do you want to buy cookies from me?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Oh, I definitely do.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [to Toby] Huh. Hit the road, jack.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: No, you hit the road, jack.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [looking pleased] Hey guys, come on. Don't fight over me.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: You know, why don't we split the order? It's only fair.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No. Wait, no. I'm buying, I make the rules. I actually do want you to fight over me. I wanna be wined and dined and... 69ed.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Ugh.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Metaphorically 69ed. Ew. Perverts... no offence Oscar. [Oscar looks flabbergasted]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Hop in, we have places to be. No rest for the wicked.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [to Dwight] All right. So... I guess this is it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Well, Jim, I just want to say that we haven't always got along and at times, I've even hated your guts. But...[smiles] bye, bye. I win.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [attempts to shake Dwight's hand] Goodbye, Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [drops golf ball into Jim's open hand] Robert, race you to the clubhouse, gentlemen's bet. Woohoo! [takes off in golf cart]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well, he's Florida's problem now.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I'll let Dwight have his fun. Today will not be his day.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What's that?

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I'm gonna tank the Sabre store at the presentation to the board.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I thought you liked the store?

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Well, the store is lovely. You created a wonderful space to showcase our product line. Great job. Cheers.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: But, there's a reason we sell our products online and over-the-phone. Have you ever used Sabre electronics, Jim? [Jim shakes head] They're cheap. They're unintuitive. The Sabre store would work if we adopted the carnival model of leaving town once everyone's wives do us.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Wow. When you put it that way, I guess it does sound pretty terrible.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I couldn't just kill the project from the start. Jo Bennett endorsed it. Shame though, I did like Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [from distanced golf cart] Robert! I'm gonna win, ha ha, I'm the gentleman! Suck it!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: [to Dwight] Bravo, Dwight! Very good! [Jim looks surprised] [to Jim] Shame.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [at Sabre headquarters] The math is simple folks. Deeper market penetration, plus greater visibility, will raise Sabre [Nellie emerges from behind Dwight] [together] to the power of two.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: How did that look?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: I'm not just saying this, that was the best thing I've ever seen.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [to Nellie] I told you.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: When you guys do that whole power of two shebang, how 'bout I pop up also? I guess we'd have to say 'power of three'. Hm, actually, you know what, yeah, that actually works. [to Nellie] You'd spin off right. I'd spin off-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You know what? That is a great idea. Cathy, write that down and print it out. It's gonna make some really good toilet paper.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [enters room] All right. There he is.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What are you doing here? I thought I got rid of you?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Can I just talk to you for one quick second?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What, your stylist ran out of 'messy spray'? [others laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Um, actually it's, it's for your own good. I think maybe we should- [gestures toward hallway]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You want to do something for my own good? Turn around, walk out that door, do not stop 'til you get to Scranton, find my cell phone charger, mail it back to me, and then go hell. [others laugh]

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Nice. [To Jim] Hey, Halpert, anyone ever tell you you look like Wooly Willy?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [to Packer] Silence.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Aw, I'm just trying to-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [interrupts] I know what you're trying to do, I don't want it. [to Jim] But your face does look like the guy from Operation.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: That's... that's the same guy. It's the joke I made.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Different guy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You know, I just think you should know that-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [interrupts] That you look like the world's tallest hobbit. [others laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well, I tried. [gestures the meeting room] You saw it, so, it's on the record. I have a plane to catch.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Can you help me? I'm trying to make a video chat with Andy.

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: Just open the program and type in his user name.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Can you just do it?

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: [after briefly typing] Here, type in your password.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: 'Erin123'

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: That's a terrible password. And you don't 'make a video chat', you video chat.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [annoyed] All right.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hello?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: That's so weird. There's something wrong with my laptop. [turns laptop on its side] Oh. I fixed it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Oh, now mine's broken. Hang on. [turns his laptop on its side while lying on desk] Oh, there we go.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [on phone with Jim] He said, 'I did like Dwight'? He's gonna fire him.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: No, no, I think it was more like, 'you know, I liked him, but I don't anymore because he did a bad job, so I'm definitely gonna yell at him'.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Robert doesn't talk like that. You have to stop Dwight from doing this.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I tried. He will not listen.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Did you actually try your hardest?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yes... my pretty hardest. Look, you haven't dealt with him in awhile, all right. He's like super Dwight. It's like he's been bitten by a radioactive Dwight, or som- Stanley, back me up.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Don't talk to me.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Stanley's very upset that we're leaving Florida. But he would back me up.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: If Dwight's about to get fired, you have to tell him. Just get the words out. That's all you can do.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: OK. All right.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [to Kevin] What's a skinny guy like Toby know about cookies? You can't trust him to understand the wants and needs of the thick man. Maybe Toby from two years ago.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [laughs] Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: That's true. If I have a question about my cookies at midnight, who am I gonna call? Darryl. Toby's probably in bed with some model.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: I'm, I'm not gonna comment on my personal life.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Look, I need this. Ok? Your daughter is a pretty little girl. Let her go door-to-door. You think people gonna buy cookies from my [hesitates] chubby daughter?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Oh. [looks away]

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Baby, if you're watching this, you're not chubby, you're beautiful. Daddy's just got to sell some cookies. And we're also gonna exercise more. It's gonna be fun.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: [to Kevin] Oh, you know what you have to do? To decide? You need to make them do things for you. And, like, buy you things.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Or have them sing that song! That the frog does in Looney Tunes.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Make them kiss each other.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: Make them kiss me. [everyone 'ew's] [Toby and Darryl look at each other]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Yes, this is too tan. This right here-

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: This is a tanned spot.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I don't buy it. It, that is a freckle. That is not a tan, ok? I'm gonna have to inspect it in person when you get back here. I want you looking totally 'puerto ricania' when i see you.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Well, Andy, I'm not coming back.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I have a job here. I work for an old lady. [turns laptop to put Irene into view]

quotes.speaker: Irene
quotes.text: [waves] Hello!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Andy?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, that's awesome. That's great.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [Toby and Darryl perform Hello! Ma Baby] This is tough. 'Cause Darryl, you sang better and you dance better but Toby has that indescribable quality that makes a star. I think I've reached my decision. I have decided... that you guys are gonna keep doing things for me.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: No, no, no, no. It's not worth it.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No, it's not worth it? That's too bad. 'Cause I was feeling particularly hungry this year.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Yeah, ok so what, you buy 40 boxes?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hungrier.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hungrier.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: You're not talking... triple digits?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Oh yeah, I'm talking triple digits. [folds arms satisfied while Toby and Darryl look at each other] Again. [both start performing Hello! Ma Baby again]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [straightens tie in mirror] Showtime.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [enters abruptly] Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You again? Gosh, I keep throwing you away, you keep flying back here. You're like an Amish return stick.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: OK, great, listen to me. Listen to me. [Dwight makes funny gesture] No, no, I know. Will you just let me tell you one thing, please?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yes, you may tell me one thing. Wait, you want to borrow money?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Listen to me. Robert is going to veto the Sabre store.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [rolls eyes] Jim, come on.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dwight, he's gonna kill the store.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Uh-huh.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And then, I'm pretty sure he's gonna fire you for it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Wait. [holds up fingers] He's gonna kill the store? And he's gonna fire me?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [smiles] That's two things.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dwight, please.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Nice try, Jim. Your pranks have never worked in the past and they're not going to work today.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: OK, first of all, they've mostly worked, so-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You know what? You might want to get to the airport. It's gonna take you a long time to get through security with all those beauty products. Bye.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dwight, come o-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Nothing is gonna stop me. That is the mark of a great man. Unstoppability. Dunder-Mifflin, the farm, Mose, all those things vanish in my rearview mirror. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a date with destiny. And from what I hear, she's a slu- Ah![Jim tackles Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [Jim holds him back and tries to cover his mouth] Help! Help!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Gross! Don't lick my hand! God, why is there so much saliva?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: AlI had to do was think about pie and my salivary glands did the rest.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Gross!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [attempting to break from Jim's grasp] Ah!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What? What, what, what, what, what?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [clutching side] Oh, god! You... oh! My appendix-

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm sorry.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: My wound hasn't healed yet.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm so sorry, I forgot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, man!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You all right? You ok?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [stops whining and charges Jim] Rrrah!

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: [to Cathy] Where the hell is he? I cannot do this without him.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: I don't know. He's not picking up.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Well, looks like Shnoot's a no-show. Guess he wasn't vice presy material after all. But I am. Put me in, babe. I got the info down backwards, forwards, and doggy-style. I'm your man.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: [considers and decides on Packer] Right, let's begin then. Ladies and gentlemen, allow me to introduce the vice president of Sabre Retail, Mr. Todd Packer.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Sup?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [notices Andy boxing up things from Erin's desk] What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I'm just dealing with Erin's stuff since apparently she's not coming back. And she didn't bother to tell anyone.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: We knew. Ryan told us.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Ryan, why didn't you tell me?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Thought you checker my Tumblr?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: You never update it.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Well, I updated it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Does anyone else think this is weird? And like, kind of uncool, actually? To leave us without a receptionist?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: We'll find another receptionist. I mean, that's easy. We'll be fine. [Andy nods reluctantly]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [trying to get around Jim] Huh, huh, huh! [slides between Jim's legs]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I was trying to go-

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Get up.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ok, ok.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Get up. All right? I'm not gonna let you by.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Then you know what? I'm just gonna have to run right through you.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: OK. [Dwight runs in place] What are you doing? Are you really revving up? you know that doesn't work.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [tries to jump off wall] Jackie Chan! [falls and groans]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [holding mobile phone up] Go.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [in a feminine voice] Hi. This is Alex.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: [in feminine voice] And this is Sam.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [in a feminine voice] Kevin can't come to the phone right now because he's busy with us.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Perfect! Now people will think I'm doing hot girls all day.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I don't know, man, they might think we're drag queens.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Yeah, I don't know why you picked names that are also guys' names.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Okay, now who do I ride to the kitchen like a pony?

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Don't make me be your pony, Kevin.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Forget it, man.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: What do you mean?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I'm out. And so is Toby.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: This may be wrong. But there's a limit to what I would do for my child.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Yeah. I have my dignity too. I refuse to be another man's horsey.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No guys, stop! You have to sell me cookies. I'll do anything. [starts performing Hello! Ma Baby] I'm even gonna kiss Meredith. [kisses Meredith] That is... hmph... that's ah... so good. [almost in tears Meredith pulls him toward her by his tie]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [tackled by Dwight] What are you doing? No. No, no, no.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: This. Ends. Now.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: This is dangerous.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [picks Jim up] Rrahh! [both fall]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Why?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Anything else you need to talk about?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Nope. I think that was it. [Dwight gets up and walks away]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [looking disheveled in mirror] Once again, it's show time.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: What baffles me is how you could take a perfectly good idea, [Dwight enters] which the great Jo Bennett rightfully signed off on, and then utterly botch it in execution.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: If I may speak to that, I have only been vice president of this project for the last half hour, so the man you want is Dwight Shrute.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I don't see Dwight. He clearly had the infinite wisdom to stay as far away from this clown show as possible.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Whatever you do, do not blame Todd Packer. It is not his fault. Blame his upbringing, his parents, the society that would mold this idiotic creature. Fire the employee, yes... but not the man. You may not cancel his soul.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: That was never on the table.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: [to Nellie] Are you kidding? [to Robert] She's the queen of the whole freaking Magilla!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: And yet Todd, it's you who's fired.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: What, you, I, I can't get fired. I'm an institution. I have been at this company for 20 years. How many of you have been here that long, huh? [Dwight exits meeting room and helps Jim up]

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [Dwight and Jim enter office] Hey, hey. They're back. [Everyone greets them]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Dwight, what are you doing here? I thought you were supposed to be in Florida?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yeah, the crazy thing about that is, um, wow you look great. Did you lose some weight?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Thank you, for someone who actually notices this. No, I didn't lose weight. But I started using my makeup to contour my face to look skinnier. I actually put on five pounds.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [to Stanley] Hey! Good to have you back.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [insincerely] Good to be back.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [to Jim] Hey, stranger!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Aw, I missed you.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I missed you. [they embrace and kiss as Andy watches on sadly]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Aw.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I'm going to Florida to get Erin. [grabs coat, runs out, then returns] Forgot to turn off my email. It's crazy, right? It's just, when she said she was leaving, I felt so- [looks at computer frustrated] 'You're about to close four tabs, are you sure you want to continue?' Yes. I am sure. Ah, slow computer!
